formatted_address: Blk 377 Hougang St. 32, #01-02/16 Hougang Rivercourt, Singapore 530377
name: Takagi Ramen @ Hougang Rivercourt

reviews.text: The food price is reasonable! It’s nice and I forgot to take picture. The hot green tea is fragrance and nice! Auntie Peggy is friendly and dedicated to her work. I just compliment her for her attentiveness. We ordered the salmon rice and was given the pot of green tea to pour into rice. But I did not know the pot is for us to drink as well. Auntie Peggy passed to  us and guide us. The place is clean and great place to dine with friends and family.

Takagi Ramen is a hidden gem for ramen lovers, offering a cozy and inviting atmosphere with a menu that doesn’t disappoint. Their broth is rich and flavorful, perfectly complementing the springy, fresh noodles. The chashu is tender and melt-in-your-mouth delicious, while the soft-boiled eggs are marinated to perfection. The service is quick and friendly, adding to the overall enjoyable dining experience. Whether you're a ramen connoisseur or a first-timer, Takagi Ramen delivers a satisfying bowl every time. Highly recommended for an authentic and comforting meal!

I wanted to take the ramen but not the meat. So I asked the staff, he kindly explained that the meat could be changed to egg.

We wanted to eat our food in the store, but take away the cheesecake. After ordering we told the staff, he then packed the choose cake nicely for us with the utensils!

My kids and I love coming to this outlet. Food is tasty and doesn't burn a hole in the pocket. Staff is friendly, premises are clean and cosy.
Bonus! Kids get a free pack of Pokemon cards with every kid's meal before 11am.

Tried their Christmas menu on Christmas Eve! Their ingredients were super generous!! Really in the spirit of Christmas. Soup broth is nice as usual. The only down side is their aircon is too cold! Soup got cold pretty fast, otherwise, will strong recommend the place for dining.

vicinity: Blk 377 Hougang Street 32, #01-02/16 Hougang Rivercourt, Singapore
